title: How to Make a Death by Chocolate Drink

steps.headline: Measure and pour the Baileys, dark crème de cacao, ice cream, and cream in a blender.
Add the crushed ice in the blender.
Blend everything to a smooth mixture.
Use a hurricane glass to pour the drink into.
Garnish the drink with a maraschino cherry.

text: Measure and pour the Baileys, dark crème de cacao, ice cream, and cream in a blender.  Add the crushed ice in the blender.  Blend everything to a smooth mixture.  Use a hurricane glass to pour the drink into.  Garnish the drink with a maraschino cherry.  Finished.
